original_title: Frame by Frame: The Invisible Art of Production Designer Carol Spier
overview: The invisible art of production designer Carol Spier. The relationship between director and production designer is a special one. FRAME BY FRAME is a documentary that goes behind the scenes of David Cronenberg's sci-fi film, eXistenZ, for a rare and fascinating look at the art of production designer, Carol Spier.

production_companies.name: Rogers Documentary and Cable Network Fund
Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

title: Frame by Frame: The Invisible Art of Production Designer Carol Spier
